# Pre-requisite

## load package
```{r message = FALSE,warning = FALSE}

rm(list=ls())

library(dplyr)

```
## Load dataset

```{r}

# Load Dataset
dataset <- read_excel("dataset/Dataset2.xlsx")

```

# Exploratory Data Analysis

Convert `Region` column data type to `factor` 
```{r}
dataset$Region <- as.factor(dataset$Region)
```




## Summary statistic

```{r}
summary(dataset)
```

```{r}

```
